text.autoconfig.mapatlases.title: Map Atlases Config
text.autoconfig.mapatlases.option.maxMap: Max number of Maps in an Atlas
text.autoconfig.mapatlases.option.enable: Allow entry of Empty Maps & their consumption
text.autoconfig.mapatlases.option.forceU: Force Using An Atlas In Hands
text.autoconfig.mapatlases.option.maxMap: The maximum number of Maps (Filled & Empty combined) allowed to be inside an Atlas.
text.autoconfig.mapatlases.option.forceM: Scale the mini-map to a given pixel size. (Default is 64)
text.autoconfig.mapatlases.option.drawMi: If 'true', the Mini-Map of the Active Map will be drawn on the HUD while the Atlas is on your hot-bar or off-hand.
text.autoconfig.mapatlases.option.enable: If 'true', Atlases will be able to store Empty Maps and auto-fill them as you explore.
text.autoconfig.mapatlases.option.forceU: If 'true', Atlases will require to be held in Main or Off Hands to be displayed or updated.
